workflows.name: Initialize Terms Data
workflows.description: Initialize terms and contact data if not already set

fb372d6d-0cd3-498b-b034-9539a032936b.code:
// Show back to top button when scrolled down more than 300px
variables['68072d34-f6af-4dd1-a24d-825e41c87c87']= wwLib.getFrontWindow().scrollY > 300;

default.animationKeyframes: @keyframes fadeInDown { from { opacity: 0; transform: translateY(-20px); } to { opacity: 1; transform: translateY(0); } }
@keyframes fadeInUp { from { opacity: 0; transform: translateY(20px); } to { opacity: 1; transform: translateY(0); } }
@keyframes fadeInUp { 0% { opacity: 0; transform: translateY(20px); } 100% { opacity: 1; transform: translateY(0); } }

children.code:
return [
  {"icon":"lucide/scroll","color":"#FF6E06","title":"Acceptance of Terms","number":1,"content":"By downloading, installing, or using the Animal Mitra mobile app ("App"), you agree to be bound by these Terms and Conditions. If you do not agree, please do not use the App."},
  {"icon":"lucide/pin","color":"#F1D23E","title":"Purpose of the App","number":2,"content":"Animal Mitra is a compassion-first platform enabling citizens, NGOs, feeders, and vets to:

• Rescue, foster, adopt, or help stray/domestic animals.

• Share posts for medical help, transportation, or lost & found cases.

• Adopt animals using pre-adoption and final adoption agreements.

• Create helper/NGO profiles and engage in community support."},
  { "icon":"lucide/user-round","color":"#61378D","title":"User Responsibilities","number":3,"content":"You agree to:

• Provide accurate and truthful information when filling out forms or posting.

• Follow proper care, ethics, and animal welfare responsibilities when adopting.

• Use the platform respectfully, without posting offensive, fraudulent, or misleading content.

• Respond promptly to adoption/rescue follow-ups by Animal Mitra representatives or NGOs."},
  {"icon":"lucide/camera","color":"#4CAF50","title":"Content Ownership","number":4,"content":"You retain ownership of content (photos, videos, descriptions) uploaded by you.
By uploading, you grant us a royalty-free, worldwide license to use, display, and distribute such content for animal welfare promotion."},
  {"icon":"lucide/ban","color":"#F44336","title":"Use of the Platform","number":5,"content":"You shall not:

• Use the platform for commercial resale or illegal activity.

• Impersonate any other individual or post on their behalf without consent.

• Interfere with platform operation or other users' rights."},
  {"icon":"lucide/dog","color":"#FF9800","title":"Adoption Process","number":6,"content":"• Submission of a Pre-Adoption Interest Form does not guarantee approval.

• Final adoption is subject to verification, counseling, and agreement to the Adoption Terms.

• Animal Mitra reserves the right to reclaim the animal in case of violation of terms."},
  {"icon":"lucide/globe","color":"#2196F3","title":"International Use","number":7,"content":"This app is accessible worldwide. By using it from outside India, you agree to comply with local laws as well as these Terms.
All data will be handled in accordance with Indian laws and hosted on servers located in India or internationally via secure cloud infrastructure."},
  { "icon":"lucide/user-round-x","color":"#9C27B0","title":"Termination","number":8,"content":"We reserve the right to suspend or terminate your access if:

• You violate these Terms.

• You misuse or cause harm to the platform, animals, or other users."},
  { "icon":"lucide/podcast","color":"#FF5722","title":"Disclaimers","number":9,"content":"• Animal Mitra provides a platform to connect helpers and seekers.

• We are not responsible for the conduct of individual users.

• We do not guarantee availability, health, or behavior of animals posted by users."},
  {"icon":"lucide/file-text","color":"#607D8B","title":"Limitation of Liability","number":10,"content":"Zerofold Internet Pvt Ltd shall not be liable for any indirect or consequential damages arising from use of the App."},
  {"icon":"lucide/scale","color":"#795548","title":"Governing Law","number":11,"content":"These terms shall be governed by the laws of India.
Any disputes shall be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts of Ahmedabad, Gujarat, regardless of the user's location."}
]

default.animationKeyframes: @keyframes fadeInRight { from { opacity: 0; transform: translateX(20px); } to { opacity: 1; transform: translateX(0); } }
@keyframes fadeIn { from { opacity: 0; transform: scale(0); } to { opacity: 1; transform: scale(1); } }

interactions.name: Scroll To Top
interactions.description: Scrolls to the top of the page

text.en: Animal Mitra Foundation, New Delhi, India

_ww-text_text.en: 1st Floor, Atal-Kalam Research Park Building, University Area, Ahmedabad, Gujarat - 380009

text.en: Compassionate support for stray animals through community action.

_ww-text_text.en: Compassionate support for stray animals through community action.

defaultValue.title: Acceptance of Terms
defaultValue.content: By accessing and using Animal Mitra's services, you agree to these terms and conditions.

defaultValue.title: User Registration
defaultValue.content: Users must provide accurate information when registering for our services.

defaultValue.title: Service Usage
defaultValue.content: Our services must be used in accordance with applicable laws and regulations.

defaultValue.title: Content Policy
defaultValue.content: Users are responsible for the content they post and share through our platform.

defaultValue.title: Prohibited Activities
defaultValue.content: Users must not engage in any harmful or illegal activities on our platform.

defaultValue.title: Animal Care Guidelines
defaultValue.content: Users must follow our animal care and welfare guidelines.

defaultValue.title: International Usage
defaultValue.content: Our services are available internationally, subject to local laws.

defaultValue.title: Liability
defaultValue.content: Limitations of liability and disclaimer of warranties.

defaultValue.title: Privacy Policy
defaultValue.content: How we collect, use, and protect your personal information.

defaultValue.title: Payment Terms
defaultValue.content: Terms related to donations and payments through our platform.

defaultValue.title: Legal Jurisdiction
defaultValue.content: These terms are governed by the laws of India.
